Container.Name: Paperwork
Container.Description: [h3]Paperwork[/h3]Paperwork aims to be an open-source, self-hosted alternative to services like Evernote (R), Microsoft OneNote (R) or Google Keep (R).[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]Be sure to change the Host port from [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']80[/span] to [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']something else[/span] as [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']80[/span] is the port unRAID uses for its web interface.[/b][br][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is where Paperwork will store it\'s database connection file and the database which contains data for users, notebooks, and notes.[br]
